# Libraries

```{r}
# library("remotes")

library("condsurv")
library(dplyr)
library(survival)

```


# Example 

```{r}
lung2 <- 
  mutate(
    lung,
    os_yrs = time / 365.25
  )


myfit <- survfit(Surv(os_yrs, status) ~ 1, data = lung2)

# ?conditional_surv_est
conditional_surv_est(
  basekm = myfit,
  t1 = 0.5, 
  t2 = 1
)


```
